text: Alibaba (1688) Privacy Policy
Update date: June 17, 2022
label: Policy Change

text: 【introduction】
You are welcome to use our products and services!

We know the importance of personal information to you. Your trust is very important to us. We will strictly abide by laws and regulations to take corresponding security protection measures to protect your personal information security and controlling.

Based on this, the 1688 platform service provider (or "we") formulates this "Alibaba (1688) Privacy Policy" (hereinafter referred toIn the process of service, how will we collect, use, share, store, and protect your personal information, as well as how you can manage your personal information so that you can make better choices.

Before you start using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses we logging in the threatening of the body/coarse body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before starting to use.
label: Policy Change
Important
rewrite: Before using our products and services, please read and understand this policy carefully. In particular, we should focus on reading the clauses that are identified by the threading of the lines/thick body to ensure that you fully understand and agree to use it before you start using it.

text: The professional vocabulary involved in this policy, we try to explain to you in a concise and popular expression in order to facilitate your understanding.
If you have any questions, opinions or suggestions on the content of this policy, you can contact us through the contact information at the end of this policy.

You agree that the privacy policy said that you have understood the functions provided by the application, and the necessary personal information required for functional operation, and give corresponding collection and use authorization, but it does not mean that you have agreed to open up additional functions and handle non -necessary personal information.The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.
label: Policy Change
Important
First Party Collection Information
rewrite: The opening, processing non -necessary personal information and processing sensitive personal information of related additional functions, we will solicit your consent separately according to your actual usage.

text: This privacy policy will help you understand the following:
1. Scope of application
2. Information collection and use
3. Provide information to the outside world
Fourth, your rights
5. Storage of information
6. Policy update
7. Protection of minors
Eight, contact us
Appendix: Related Definition
1. Scope of application

This policy is suitable for the various products and services provided by the 1688 platform service providers with new forms provided to you with new forms that appeared with technology development with technology.

We and affiliated companies have a privacy policy separately for the products or services that it provided to you (such as "1688 Merchant Version Privacy Policy", "1688 Industrial Privacy Policy" and "Privacy Policy of the Performance Bao"), then corresponding products or servicesApplicable corresponding privacy policies.

Except for the relevant information collection and use activities described in this policy, this policy is not applicable to other services you provided by the 1688 platform sellers and other third directions. Other services apply to the personal information collection and use rules that they explain to you.
For example, when you join the seller or brand member, the use of such sellers or brands to use the rules that they specifically explained to you.
2. Information collection and use
label: Usage
First Party Collection Information

text: When you use our products/services, the personal information we need/may need to collect and use includes the following:
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 1. In order to realize the basic functions of providing you with our products and/or services, you must authorize us to collect and use the necessary information.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide the corresponding information, you will not be able to use our products and/or services normally
label: First Party Collection Information

text: 2. In order to provide you with additional functions to our products and/or services, you can choose to agree or disagree with the information we collected and used alone.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: If you refuse to provide it, you will not be able to use related additional functions normally or cannot achieve the functional effects we intend to achieve, which will not affect your basic functions.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: We are here to remind you that we are committed to creating a variety of products and services to meet your needs.

Because there are many types and services we provide to you, and there are differences in the scope of the specific product/service selected by different users, the basic/additional functions and the personal information types and scope of personal information and use will be different. Please use specific ones.Product/service function shall prevail.
label: First Party Collection Information

text: The specific feature scenarios we will provide you include::

1. Basic member service

In order to create a 1688 platform account, you need to provide us with at least your mobile phone number, the member name and password you are going to use.

text: 3. Authentication

In order to meet relevant laws and regulations and regulatory requirements, ensure the authenticity of the user's identity, and achieve anti -fraud, such as risk control, guarantee system and service security, when you use specific services/functions, we need to collect your relevant information for identity verification, such as:

First Party Collection Information

text: 3. Provide information to the outside world
(1) Sharing
We will not share your personal information with companies, organizations and individuals other than 1688 platform service providers, except for the following situations:

text: 1. Data protection technical measures

Data Security

text: 3. Response of personal information security incident
label: Data Security

text: If our physical, technical, or management protection facilities are damaged, and the information is caused by unauthorized access, public disclosure, tampering or destruction, and damage to your legitimate rights and interests, we will launch an emergency plan in time and take reasonable and necessary measures.In order to reduce the impact on your personal.

Data Security

Data Security

Data Security

text: Appendix: Related Definition
1688 platform: refers to the 1688 platform (the domain name involved in Alibaba.com.cn, Alibaba.cn, 1688.com) website and Alibaba (1688) client.

1688 platform service provider: refers to the 1688 platform's Internet information and software technology service providers Hangzhou Alibaba Advertising Co., Ltd., Alibaba (China) Network Technology Co., Ltd.
Related Company: Refers to the affiliated company of 1688 platform service providers disclosed by Alibaba Group Holding Limited (Alibaba Group Holding Limited).
Alipay: Refers to the main Alipay (China) Network Technology Co., Ltd. providing Alipay services.
Personal information: Various information related to the recognized or recognized natural persons recorded in electronics or other ways, excluding information after anonymous processing.

Sensitive personal information: Once sensitive personal information is leaked or illegally, it is easy to lead to personal information that is harmful to natural person's personality dignity or personality and property security.Track information, and personal information of minors under the age of 14.
Child: Refers to minors under the age of 14.

Equipment information: Including device identifiers (IMEI, IDFA, Android ID, Mac, OAID, IMSI and other device -related information), application information (application crash information, notification switch status, application installation list, and other application related information), equipment parameters), equipment parametersAnd system information (device type, device model, operating system and hardware -related information), device network environment information (IP address, WIFI information, base station information and other network -related information).
The actual collection of the product shall prevail.

Service log information: Including browsing records, click to view records, search query records, collection, add to shopping carts, transactions, after -sales, follow sharing information, publishing information, and IP address, browser type, telecommunications operator, use language, access, accessDate and time and the webpage record you visit.
Decoration: Refers to the process of personal information processing, so that it cannot recognize specific natural persons without using additional information.
Anonymous: Refers to the process that personal information cannot identify specific natural persons and cannot recover.
<the-end-of-privacy-policy>
